channel.title: If you remember those crashes I had..
channel.description:
Remember I started a thread about my game crashing after going into another map?
Well I found out what the problem was.. It was one or more files from the Killazss server (Winservars now..)
I deleted all Killazss related files from the models and materials folder, and things are OK again.. That is, until I go back into the server.
Anyway to fix this?
Thanks guys.

item.title: If you remember those crashes I had..
item.dc:creator: _amp_955_dam
item.description:
I told him but he doesn’t give a shit.

I’m going to Mr. Greens instead.
Thanks guys. Wonderful help.

Seriously. o.O

Read full topic
item.source: If you remember those crashes I had..

item.title: If you remember those crashes I had..
item.dc:creator: Samapico
item.description:
How about telling the guy who runs the server about it?

Read full topic
item.source: If you remember those crashes I had..

item.title: If you remember those crashes I had..
item.dc:creator: Level
item.description:
In the multiplayer settings (IIRC) there is a setting to turn off downloading custom content from the server.

Probably won’t work so hot in gmod as it does in other games, but you can give it a try.

Read full topic
item.source: If you remember those crashes I had..

item.title: If you remember those crashes I had..
item.dc:creator: _amp_955_dam
item.description:
Hahahahahaaa. [COLOR=‘Red’][Stupid Spelling]
Hilarious.

I actually knew someone was going to say that.

But no, I love the server… Is there like any downloads for these files that aren’t infected.

Read full topic
item.source: If you remember those crashes I had..

item.description:
Don’t go on the server.
